game.name: Degeons Project
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The abandoned mega-complex of Degeons Laboratory's holds dark secrets. Solve unique puzzles, investigate the cause of the catastrophe, and find out why the mysterious Man in the Crow Suit is watching you. Test your mind in this scientific enigma.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The abandoned mega-complex of Degeons Laboratory's holds dark secrets. Solve unique puzzles, investigate the cause of the catastrophe, and find out why the mysterious Man in the Crow Suit is watching you. Test your mind in this scientific enigma.
